    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        public static PAPEngineFactory newInstance(java.lang.String factoryClassName,
                           java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
                                    throws FactoryException
        Creates a new PAPEngineFactory instance using the given class name and ClassLoader. If the ClassLoader is null, use the default thread class loader.
        Parameters:
        factoryClassName - the String name of the factory class to instantiate
        classLoader - the ClassLoader to use to load the factory class
        Returns:
        an instance of an object that extends PAPEngineFactory to use in creating PAPEngine objects.
        Throws:
        FactoryException

      • newInstance

      • newEngine

        public abstract PAPEngine newEngine(java.lang.String myURLString)
                             throws FactoryException,
                                    PAPException
        Creates a new PAPEngine based on the configured PAPEngineFactory.
        Parameters:
        myURLString - - optional parameter needed by some PAPEngines and not others
        Returns:
        a new PAPEngine
        Throws:
        PAPException
        FactoryException
